 Alphah::
"We should start the device right now... this stuff can't wait"replied Alphah
  black_ben14 <black_ben14@...> wrote: Pegatron:Great,now when should we start?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Alphah::
> "The challenge will be to atract Nightstrike to a tramp..."said 
Alpha"Epyon could beat him one, he could beat him again or we can use 
the challenge to capture him..."
>   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: Pegatron:And what kind of 
challenge could we win?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > ALPHAH::
> > "Attack Decepticons' base could be dangerous... perhaps if we set 
a 
> tramp for him... I don't know a sort of challenge for Condor... He 
> seems hate Epyon and if he knows that Epyon challeng him perhaps he 
> appears and we can capture him..."
> >   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: Pegatron smilled at 
her "Of 
> course I`ll help.And for the plan I`ve 
> > got a basic one:I attack the base from the front,they get out of 
> the 
> > base,and then you take NightStrike from behind.If you have a 
better 
> > one tell me."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > >  Alphah::
> > > "As soon as I make the device that help us to put in stasis... 
> and 
> > make a plan to capture him... "said Alphah"Do you like help me... 
> to 
> > capture him?"
> > >   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: Pegatron was impressed 
by 
> > Alpha`s determination to save Condor"Then 
> > > when are you thinking to make him back?I`ll be with you at 
this."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > >  Alphah:
> > > > "Find out the way to knock out, Condor withouth hurt him"said 
> > > ALphah"In order to bring him back... It's funny... He kept his 
> word 
> > > to free me if Epyon promised let him go... I think that that 
> means 
> > > that some Maximal's essence exist in his spark"
> > > >   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: Pegatron had some 
sort 
> of 
> > > smile in his face"Good,what are you planing 
> > > > to do next?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > >  Alphah:::
> > > > > "Yes" said softly and with sad voice
> > > > >   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: He ignore Alpha for 
a 
> > > > moment without saying a word."Yeah,and you?Did 
> > > > > you recovered some strenght while we were in battle?"he 
said 
> > with 
> > > a 
> > > > > neutral voice.
> > > > >

> wrote:

> > > > > > Alphah looked Pegatron's leave CR's

slowly

that..."he
